Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: The port for the Web UI. Maps container port 5555 to host port 5000.

Config.Name: Systemd D-Bus
Config.Description: Read-only access to the Systemd D-Bus socket for log access.

Config.Name: Systemd Mount
Config.Description: Read-only access to the Systemd directory.

Config.Name: Journald Socket
Config.Description: Read-only access to the Journald socket.

Config.Name: Var Log
Config.Description: Read-only access to the host's /var/log directory.

Config.Name: Opt Mount
Config.Description: Read-only access to the host's /opt directory.

Config.Name: Home Mount
Config.Description: Read-only access to the host's /home directory.

Config.Name: Docker Socket
Config.Description: Read-only access to the Docker socket for container logs.

Config.Name: Docker Containers
Config.Description: Read-only access to Docker's container directory for log reading.

Config.Name: Local Time
Config.Description: Read-only access to the host's localtime file to sync the timezone.

Config.Name: TTYD
Config.Description: Enable TTYD for Web UI. Leave as 'true' to enable.

Config.Name: PORT
Config.Description: Internal container port used for the Web UI. Must match the port configured for the WebUI Port mapping.

Config.Name: TTYD Interactive
Config.Description: Enable TTY support for TUI mode. Leave as 'true'.

Config.Name: Stdin Open
Config.Description: Enable stdin for interactive TUI mode. Leave as 'true'.
